caption: Respond to a property possession claim
hintText: When making the claim, {{claimantName}} had to say the date they gave you notice (the date of service). If youâ€™re not sure of the exact date, you can find it on the notice.
listItem1: They served you with a notice seeking possession on {{noticeDate}}
noticeDateLabel: When did you receive notice from {{claimantName}} (Optional)?

date.notRealDate: Date of notice must be a real date
date.futureDate: The date you received notice must either be today's date or in the past
date.invalidValue: Date of notice must be a real date
date.missingOne: Your date of notice must include a {{missingField}}
date.missingTwo: Your date of notice must include a {{first}} and {{second}}
